prompt_used:

Create a compelling witty marketing video with this narrative:

NARRATIVE: Need a new roof? We've got you covered! Truline Roofing: Your local experts. Quality service, unbeatable prices! Don't wait, protect your home today. Call now for a free estimate!

VISUAL STYLE: Roof installation, Happy homeowners, Tools and materials, Before and after shots, Truline logo

REQUIREMENTS:
- witty tone throughout
- Professional cinematography with smooth transitions
- End with clear call-to-action: "Call Now"
- Modern, engaging visual effects
- High production value
- Clear, readable text overlays when needed

MOOD: Confident, professional, engaging

Video requirements:
- High quality cinematic visuals
- Smooth camera movements
- Professional lighting
- Clean composition
- Duration: exactly 15 seconds
- Aspect ratio: 9:16
